details.sectionContent: Smash the ball as hard as you can.

Only 1 tennis ball will be provided for 1 match.Participants have to bring their own CRICKET BAT for their team.In case of a tie, there will be a super over.There will be one bonus over.The decision of the umpire will be final.Members of any team ARGUING with the umpire over any decision will be DISQUALIFIED.

Time 20 minutes and 6 overs per innings. It is a team of 6 and minimum 1 girl should play. No accessories allowed. If the bowler bowls above the waist height the first time he would be given a warning, and for the second time the bowler's over will be cancelled. Rest of the over has to be bowled compulsorily by a girl.Each player will bowl 1 over only. One bounce one hand out. Direct catch out.6 will be considered out. No LBW.

Only throw bowling is allowed.2 runs will be given for a wide ball, and the ball will be considered in the over.If a girl is batting and a boy is bowling he will bowl underarm.If a girl is batting and a girl is bowling, then she will bowl overarm.The team batting second will get to play only those many overs that they bowled in 20 minutes in first inning.
